google_reviews.author: Laura Sweet Mouse Rawes
google_reviews.review: I live here they accept Section 8, low income which is really hard to find in Bellingham

google_reviews.author: Denise Mercer
google_reviews.review: I used to live here. I would love to move back. It was a very nice place to live then. Approx 12 yrs ago.

google_reviews.author: Kevyn Jacobs
google_reviews.review: I have lived here for almost 10 years. It's affordable clean and safe housing in downtown Bellingham.

google_reviews.author: Rising Horizon Gaming
google_reviews.review: Living here has been the best thing that has happened to me. This place really saved my life
